item.description:
Mother Mary is said to be “Full of Grace,” but where did this come from and what does it mean to us now? How did She become so full of grace (gracefulness, graciousness...) and why does it matter so profoundly to us? During this seminar, you will learn what grace is and what you would need to do to become one who is so full of grace that love and life moves through you freely, with joy, and overflows fully toward others.

 

 

About the Presenter...

Mother Clare Watts is the co-director of a mystical Christian school and Order called the Order of Christ/Sophia. She is an ordained Master Teacher and Priest, holding a Master’s Degree in Counseling Psychology with post-graduate training in Jungian Analysis, and is a Certified Professional Midwife. She is also the author of Giving Birth to God: A Woman's Path To Enlightenment. Watch her on YouTube.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Master Teacher Seminar: Full of Grace
